MELHOR JOGO QUE EXISTE NESSA PORRA

[b] Hello! Let me tell my story about this game:
I have been playing the Counter-Strike franchise for almost 13 years, and I am still playing. I know that I have only 300 hours, but I played on many accounts. I have like 3-4K hours. To be honest, it made my childhood, and I just want to say that this "might" be my favorite game but at the moment, CS:GO has some problems with the cheaters around, they appear even if you have the Prime purchased. It makes me think that is a problem and because of them, I cannot retrieve my rank, just because of them, it's the only reason. The VAC (Valve Anti-Cheat) needs to be fixed and improved. Also, I heard that the Overwatch mode is not working properly, which needs to be fixed as well. Without these banning features, this game will be a let down for almost everyone playing for a while (including me). In the past, I had some great experiences, but now, I don't feel like I have the same experience, which is quite stressful.
Overall, this game series has been a successful one since November 8th 2000, when the 1st Valve Game was launched, The Original Counter-Strike. Even CS:GO is a successful game since its launch in August 21st 2012, but as I said earlier, the cheaters are making this game a mess, so Valve, please make this game great again. This review is too long, but I had to type a summary about this game and its problems. If you read the whole thing and you see this, Thank you for taking some time to read it. [/b]
